head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths O'BRIEN, HENRY J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths O'BRIEN, HENRY J.

block.p: O'BRIEN-Henry J. On August 3, 2000. Loving brother-in-law of Elizabeth Philips. Dear brother of Margaret Ackley, Ernest O'Brien, Alice Freehill, Jane White and the late John and Alma O'Brien. Also survived by many nieces and nephews. Family will receive friends at the Edwin L. Bennett Funeral Home, 824 Scarsdale Avenue, Scarsdale, NY on Saturday 7-9PM and Sun 2-4 and 7-9PM. Mass will be held at our Lady of Mt. Carmel Church, Elmsford, NY at 11AM on Monday. Interment to follow at the Gate of Heaven cemetery.

O'BRIEN-Henry J. On August 3, 2000. Loving brother-in-law of Elizabeth Philips. Dear brother of Margaret Ackley, Ernest O'Brien, Alice Freehill, Jane White and the late John and Alma O'Brien. Also survived by many nieces and nephews. Family will receive friends at the Edwin L. Bennett Funeral Home, 824 Scarsdale Avenue, Scarsdale, NY on Saturday 7-9PM and Sun 2-4 and 7-9PM. Mass will be held at our Lady of Mt. Carmel Church, Elmsford, NY at 11AM on Monday. Interment to follow at the Gate of Heaven cemetery.
